about_the_game:
Welcome to JUMP! The floor is... the ultimate multiplayer showdown that will test your reflexes, strategy, and competitive spirit!

     In this exhilarating game, you and up to five other players must navigate a treacherous arena where the floor itself is your biggest threat.

     The goal is simple yet challenging: be the first to reach the trophy.

 Power-UP System

  •   The arena is filled with power-ups that can give you a temporary edge.

  •   These power-ups include increased speed, super jump, flight and others.

  •   Each power-up lasts just 3 seconds, so you’ll need to use them wisely and strategically to gain an advantage over your competitors.

Level Design

     The floor can turn into an array of deadly hazards, from explosive surface and scorching lava to bouncy pads, moving sand and even the outer space.

     Each map is designed with multiple paths, unique challenges and opportunities, offering players the freedom to find and choose their route to victory.

     But the challenges don’t stop there. The map is littered with traps designed to hinder your progress and test your agility.

     From spike pits to moving platforms, every step you take could be your last chance to win the round.

Time Management and Abilities

     Each round is timed, pushing players to balance speed with strategy. The faster you complete your objective, the greater the rewards, but rushing can lead to costly mistakes.

     Players have the ability to strategically throw bombs and plant mines, creating powerful disruptions to enemy tactics. Strategic placement and effective use of these abilities can turn the tide of battle in your favor.

     You'll need quick reflexes, sharp wits, and a keen sense of timing to navigate the dangerous terrain and outmaneuver your opponents.

     The thrill of the chase, the excitement of close calls, and the satisfaction of a well-timed jump all come together to create an adrenaline-pumping experience that will keep you coming back for more.

     Get ready to leap, dodge, and outsmart your competitors in a game where the floor is never safe and every jump counts– let the jumping madness begin!

name: JUMP! The Floor Is...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8300 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD, A high-speed internet connection to play online
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit, Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5500 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD, A high-speed internet connection to play online

short_description: Do you remember the excitement of hopping from spot to spot, avoiding the ”Lava”? We’re bringing back those childhood memories with a game inspired by the fun we all had growing up. You can test your reflexes, strategy, and competitive spirit. The goal is simple: be the first to reach the trophy.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
